00013 // definition of WeightOutputter class
00014 // computes the operation on each spike list
00015 // Operation is a functor (const std::deque<Time> &, const Time &, const Time &)
00017 
00018 class WeightOutputter
00019         : public Outputter
00020 {
00021 protected:
00022     void do_operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop) {
00023         DataCommonNeuronVisitor vis;
00024         for (std::list<Group * const>::const_iterator i = group_list().begin();
00025                 i != group_list().end();
00026                 ++i)
00027             for (std::list<NeuronInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator j = get_neuron_list(*i).begin();
00028                     j != get_neuron_list(*i).end();
00029                     ++j) {
00030                 (*j)->apply_visitor(vis);
00031                 for (std::list<SynapseInterfaceBase * const>::const_iterator k = vis.postsyn_list_pointer()->begin();
00032                         k != vis.postsyn_list_pointer()->end();
00033                         ++k)
00034                     file_ << (*k)->weight() << "\t";
00035                 vis.reset();
00036             }
00037         file_ << std::endl;
00038     }
00039 };

00042 
00043 #endif  //WEIGHTOUTPUTS_H
